nodes.text: The Spice Mines of Kemix was a spice-mining operation that was established on the planet Kemix by the Hutt crime lord Riboga during the Clone Wars, after he discovered naturally-occurring deposits of glitterstim on the world. However, the mine was subsequently destroyed by the Heroes of Cularin—a band of freelance agents from the Cularin system—which crippled Riboga's criminal empire.
